text: Kazhakam is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by MP Sukumaran Nair and starring Nedumudi Venu and Urvashi in the lead roles.http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/controversy-mars-kerala-film-awards- again/1/283405.html ==Plot== ==Cast== *Urvashi * Nedumudi Venu * Ravi Vallathol *Mullanezhi * Sreelatha Namboothiri * Kukku Parameswaran * Meena Ganesh * Valsala Menon ==Awards== ;Kerala State Film Award *Best Film * Best Actress- Urvashi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kazhakam (1996 film)
